title: Cannot Create Item Set
body:
Since the release of Ivern I have tried not only on multiple occasions to make an item set for him, but now to edit a Lulu set as well, and I have been unable to successfully drag an item into the different segments in order to build upon the item sets. 

Just wondering if something is up with that, or maybe my client is just bugged for some reason. Any help is appreciated!

replies.body:
If you're running a Mac with macOS 10.12 Sierra, this is a known bug specifically between the client and this version of the OS. The workaround at the moment is to edit or create item sets on another computer *not running* macOS 10.12 Sierra. 

We're tracking these bugs on [this post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra) Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o5AWElZE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-12T03:17:32.103+0000)
>
> If you're running a Mac with macOS 10.12 Sierra, this is a known bug specifically between the client and this version of the OS. The workaround at the moment is to edit or create item sets on another computer *not running* macOS 10.12 Sierra. 
> 
> We're tracking these bugs on [this post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra) Let me know if you have any questions.

Awe, geez, I had a feeling it was going to be a Mac client problem. Way to go Apple, always causing problems for people. Thanks for the response!
Yeah, I can't items into item sets anymore
